channel.title: How to change the strength of Magic and Range on Hybrid PvP Base
channel.description:
I have Hybrid PvP base (V2 I think, could be V3)
I know how to edit the item's stat bonus' so I made a ring that gives +1mil bonus on everything so I can 1 hit KO NPCs etc so I know that works.
I changed the Staff Of Light's Magic Attack Bonus to 20,000 but I still don't hit higher with my Ancients (about the 30's)
Someone said that that bonus only affects how OFTEN I hit, not how hard.
I have looked ALL over for how to change how hard I hit with Magic and Range, but there seems to be no one else with this problem, or I just can't word my query right on Google.
So PLEASE can someone tell me how I can change this so I can change how to hit higher with Magic and Range :)
Thanks, Idznak

item.title: How to change the strength of Magic and Range on Hybrid PvP Base
item.dc:creator: @Idznak Idznak
item.description:
@Idznak wrote:

I have Hybrid PvP base (V2 I think, could be V3)

I know how to edit the item’s stat bonus’ so I made a ring that gives +1mil bonus on everything so I can 1 hit KO NPCs etc so I know that works.

I changed the Staff Of Light’s Magic Attack Bonus to 20,000 but I still don’t hit higher with my Ancients (about the 30’s)

Someone said that that bonus only affects how OFTEN I hit, not how hard.

I have looked ALL over for how to change how hard I hit with Magic and Range, but there seems to be no one else with this problem, or I just can’t word my query right on Google.

So PLEASE can someone tell me how I can change this so I can change how to hit higher with Magic and Range

Thanks, Idznak
